Key Match Events: Turkey's B Yilmaz was sent off in the 62nd minute, reducing them to 10 players.
The match ended in a 0-0 draw.
Post-Match Reflections: The draw marked Ryan Bellamy's first game as Wales manager.
The result was a tough outcome for Wales despite their efforts against Turkey's 10 men.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Cardiff City Stadium with an attendance of 28,625.
